org.openimaj.image.typography.general

Class GeneralFontStyle<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.typography.FontStyle<T>
      • org.openimaj.image.typography.general.GeneralFontStyle<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The pixel type

    public class GeneralFontStyle<T>
extends FontStyle<T>
    This is a wrapper and extensions for the Java AWT Font as an OpenIMAJ Font style.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
